def main(input_grid: np.ndarray) -> np.ndarray:
    (x, y) = "Traverse the image matrix and find the coordinates of the gray pixel, denoted as (x,y)"(input_grid)
    output_grid = "Get the 3*3 area image below the gray pixel (for example, if the gray pixel coordinate is (i,j), then get the 33 area with the upper left corner as (i+1,j-1) and the lower right corner as (i+3,j+1))"(input_grid, x, y)
    return output_grid
